title: API Documentation with Swagger
description: As a developer, I want to have access to API documentation so that I can understand how to interact with the system
acceptanceCriteria: AC01: Given the API root URL, when /docs is accessed, then Swagger documentation should be displayed
AC02: Given the Swagger documentation, when viewed, then all API endpoints should be listed with their HTTP methods
AC03: Given each API endpoint, when viewed in documentation, then required parameters and response formats should be clearly described
AC04: Given the Swagger UI, when an endpoint is selected, then the ability to test the endpoint should be available
AC05: Given authenticated endpoints, when documented, then the authentication requirements should be clearly specified
